name: Maze Runner (itch) (Snowfly Studios)
description:
Developed during a local 24-hour GameJam with the theme "It's Spreading".

This game is developed during the first month of Unity Education in PISMO Incubator Croatia from 09/06 to 10/06/2022.

Developed by: Boris Vuković & Ivan Trtanj

Escape the labyrint.
